name: Yar, me 'Arties!
description:
A game about exploring randomly generated Islands with hand drawn treasure maps in search of bounty.

Explore the Island in search of 5 pirates each of whom have their own treasure map leading to a unique treasure. Then, hide your own treasures and draw your own maps to share with your friends, and play theirs!

Created in under 48h by Hannah Rose for the 2020 Pirate Jam Pre-Jam Skirmish

Details for competition hosts

As per the competition rules:
All assets except for sound effects and music were created by Hannah Rose within the timeframe of the jam. The audio used and their authors are credited below.
Contact Hannah Rose at hannaesthetic.r(at)gmail.com

Credits
